text: Mr. and Mrs. Andrews is an oil painting on canvas by Thomas Gainsborough. It was painted circa 1748-1750. It measures 69.8 × 119.4 cm (27.5 × 47 in). It hangs in the National Gallery, London, England. Category:1740s paintings Category:Paintings by Thomas Gainsborough Category:Paintings in the National Gallery, London Category:1750
title: Mr. and Mrs. Andrews
